attributes.action: Honour World War 1 Veteran Harry Patch with a Knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Harry Patch is understood to be the last surviving veteren of the First World War. He has appeared on television many times and has recently visited the trenches yet again to honour his fallen comrades. Harry is a modest man whose life has been spent warning of the uselessnes of war as well as being a fine example of a wonderful generation. Please support a Knighthood for him before its too late. He is after all 109.
